name: Secret Mysteries in New York
description:
Help the police to find the killer
Beautiful 3D scenes
Incredible gameplay

1920: When a politician is found murdered in a local park, the police make the unconventional decision to ask Oscar Gaebelein, a young forensic scientist, for help.

Motivated by his desire to prove his value to the investigating team, Oscar throws himself headfirst into the investigation. However, very soon he and his colleagues discover that this first murder is only the beginning of something much more sinister.

Help Oscar to find the killer in this thrilling hidden object game.
